sect2.title: Dépendances
sect2.para: Ncurses-&ncurses-depversion; nécessite que les programmes suivants soient installés:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, mkdir, mv, rm gcc: c++, cc1, cc1plus, collect2, cpp0, gcc glibc: ldconfig grep: egrep, fgrep, grep make: make mawk: mawk sed: sed sh-utils: basename, date, echo, expr, hostname, uname textutils: cat, sort, tr, wc
